title: BPSC Exam Syllabus 2024
author: Anand kumar
paragraphs: This syllabus outlines the key topics and concepts that will be covered in the BPSC (Bihar Public Service Commission) recruitment exam 2024. It is designed to provide a comprehensive overview of the subject matter and help students prepare effectively for the written examination.

The BPSC exam is conducted in three stages: Preliminary, Mains, and Interview. Students are advised to consult official sources like the Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) website for the latest syllabus and exam pattern. The weightage for each section might vary depending on the notification.
Additional resources and practice materials can be found online and through coaching institutes.
